channel.title: Time traveler(BD), Spy(Unseen/Cult)
channel.description:
Time traveler/Time mage
Faction:Blue Dragon Type:Support
Day Ability 1: Reverse the conditions/actions of the previous night for a target player(1)
Night Ability 1: Refill 1 charge of a limited ability for a target player. Can self-use (1)
Spy
Faction: Unseen/Cult Type: Support
Passive Ability: Shown as Blue Dragon when investigated.
Night Ability 1: Determine your target player's type. (2)
Day Ability 1: Falsify a whisper from the target player. Not shown for Target player. (2)

item.title: Time traveler(BD), Spy(Unseen/Cult)
item.dc:creator: Qwert
item.description:
I am thinking about some impersonator(neutral) character, too similar to scorned though

Read full topic

item.title: Time traveler(BD), Spy(Unseen/Cult)
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
i.e. would stop someone curing nightshade, but it would extend the poison time by a night
i assume the player would be told

Read full topic

item.title: Time traveler(BD), Spy(Unseen/Cult)
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
yeah, maybe make it for the next night
basically a heal
but it undos all visits

Read full topic

item.title: Time traveler(BD), Spy(Unseen/Cult)
item.dc:creator: Qwert
item.description:
I think that’s too strong a combo with resurrect, no?

Read full topic

item.title: Time traveler(BD), Spy(Unseen/Cult)
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
it might be good if the night ability of the time traveler had infinite uses, maybe give it a 1 night cooldown

Read full topic

item.title: Time traveler(BD), Spy(Unseen/Cult)
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
no, they’re not op
none of them even have an infinite-use ability

Read full topic

item.title: Time traveler(BD), Spy(Unseen/Cult)
item.dc:creator: Qwert
item.description:
Yeah, I realised. Also, the abilities are a bit OP. Maybe they need to be nerfed a little, not sure

Read full topic

item.title: Time traveler(BD), Spy(Unseen/Cult)
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
the spy should be investigative/maybe social, as its investigating people and making whispers

Read full topic
